main event: Two bright football-shaped objects were observed in the sky over Sacramento, California on 29 April 1966.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 45 minutes, The objects seemed to hover and move up and down, One object changed color from brilliant white to reddish-orange, The objects were observed from an angle of approximately 30 degrees, Witness described the sound of the objects as loud, similar to a jet.
witness description: Air Craft Worker, McDonnell AFB, California
